Text Reader

About this project

This is a text to speech app for non-verbal people. When users push a button with a certain text, the app reads the text for them. Users can type in their own sentences. Different kinds of voices and languages can be selected. This app uses the Web Speech API (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Web_Speech_API).
